description: Maps the input file according to the provided template file. The API call downloads the file contents from the Amazon S3 location, and passes the contents in as a string, to the inputFileContent parameter.

parameters.name: inputFileContent
parameters.description: Specify the contents of the EDI (electronic data interchange) XML or JSON file that is used as input for the transform.

parameters.name: mappingTemplate
parameters.description: Specifies the mapping template for the transformer. This template is used to map the parsed EDI file using JSONata or XSLT.

parameters.name: fileFormat
parameters.description: Specifies that the currently supported file formats for EDI transformations are JSON and XML.

nested_items.name: mappedFileContent
nested_items.description: Returns a string for the mapping that can be used to identify the mapping. Similar to a fingerprint.
